data.message: Haylee was much cuter than Paris JAckson was...She was a real girl out of all of that talk...Paris Perry aka Paris Jackson and Katy PErry mixed to together altogether was a giant smoke screen to Kick Start with...They think that all those guy's are after them...but the thing is some of these guy's back then did not even know who the flaming fuck these girl's were...So Yes Haylee is a REAL GIRL that came from your lips by the way...you tole me this once a while back or so...Im Mat Hoffman's STep cousin Harrison Garrett and not a obsessed fan...Had some business approaches with you...I thought you could pay about $4.00 per cd out of pocket relations soon...Michael Jackson once told me I was shit faced to say it all!

replies.message: Sing that 16th note that is all she was worth! Who did you think I meant that to?
